meanings.definition: A small pore in the epidermis of a leaf or stem through which water is exuded.
meanings.sent1: The hydathodes on the leaf help release excess water.
meanings.sent2: Bees are attracted to the sweet water exuded from hydathodes.
meanings.sent3: The hydathodes seemed to be playing a game of water tag with the raindrops.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled out like water from hydathodes, refreshing everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The hydathodes acted like tiny faucets, dripping water rhythmically.
